description: 12 heist roles for The Heist game

roles.name: Mastermind
roles.description: Strategic planner who coordinates the entire operation and adapts plans on the fly

roles.name: Hacker
roles.description: Disables security systems and manipulates electronic locks

minigames.description: Drag colored wires to match ports on both sides
Memorize and tap button pattern in correct order
Tap when spinning cipher symbols align correctly
Swipe keycard at correct speed (not too fast or slow)
Drag circular dial and stop at exact numbers
Tap pins when moving indicator hits green zone
Tap when audio cue plays to find combination
Tilt phone or swipe to avoid obstacles while driving
Hold button until tank is full, don't overflow
Tap brake when meter hits green zone to park perfectly

roles.name: Insider
roles.description: Legitimate access provider with inside knowledge

minigames.description: Swipe badge at correct speed to unlock door
Remember access codes shown briefly and enter them
Tap correct items in bag before time runs out

roles.name: Grifter
roles.description: Social engineering expert who talks their way past security

minigames.description: Pick dialogue response before timer runs out
Tap facial expression that matches the situation
Tap buttons in rhythm to be convincing
Tap when moving indicator hits green zone for stealth takedown
Rapidly tap button to break through barrier
Tap immediately when prompt appears
Find anomalies between two security camera feeds
Tap threats as they appear on multiple camera feeds
Watch guard patrol pattern and repeat the sequence
Drag and match items to correct buyers
Stop slider at best price point during negotiation
Tap all defects in forgery before time runs out
Tap in rhythm with beat to climb silently
Tap to advance when lasers clear your path
Tilt phone to keep balance meter centered
Bounce off ledges to scale the building
Swipe over fingerprints to wipe them clean
Tap all evidence markers in scene before time runs out
Drag items to trash bin quickly
Tap when shrinking circle reaches center for perfect steal
Drag items from pocket rapidly without detection
Swipe to steal when target looks away
